## calculateDegree() function

Calculate degree that match the rotation type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function calculateDegree(rotation: Rotation): 0 | 90 | 180 | 270;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                             | Description      |
| --------- | -------------------------------- | ---------------- |
| rotation  | [Rotation](./models.rotation.md) | type of rotation |

**Returns:**

0 \| 90 \| 180 \| 270

rotated degree
